alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Essex; Orange; Washington; Western Addison; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 30 at 3:48AM EST until November 30 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northern New York and central, northeast, northwest and southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts may briefly subside as rain shifts into the region during the afternoon. Behind the front, wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph will again be possible when winds shift westerly, particularly downslope along the eastern Adirondacks and parts of the southern Greens.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Essex; Orange; Washington; Western Addison; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
